metadata.notes: Curated dataset of Central and Punjab Government schemes for farmers. Verify latest details from official portals.

central.name: PM-KISAN (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi)
central.description: Income support scheme providing ₹6,000 per year to eligible farmer families in three equal installments.
central.eligibility: All landholding eligible farmer families (as per scheme guidelines). Exclusions apply (institutional landholders, certain income-tax payers, etc.).

central.name: PMFBY (Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana)
central.description: Crop insurance to protect farmers against crop failure due to natural calamities, pests & diseases.
central.eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas including sharecroppers and tenant farmers.

central.name: SMAM (Sub-Mission on Agricultural Mechanization)
central.description: Subsidy support for farm machinery, Custom Hiring Centers (CHCs), Farm Machinery Banks (FMBs) to promote mechanization.
central.eligibility: Individual farmers, groups, FPOs, cooperatives and panchayats as per guidelines.
central.contact: State Agri Dept / District Agriculture Office

central.name: PM-KUSUM
central.description: Promotes installation of solar pumps and grid-connected solar power plants for irrigation and farmer income.
central.eligibility: Individual farmers, cooperatives, panchayats, FPOs as per component eligibility.

central.name: PKVY (Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana)
central.description: Promotes organic farming through cluster approach; supports certification, input management and marketing.
central.eligibility: Farmer groups/CLCs/FPOs forming clusters (usually 50 acres or as notified).

central.name: PMFME (Pradhan Mantri Formalisation of Micro Food Processing Enterprises)
central.description: Support for micro food processing units, including FPOs, for credit-linked subsidy, branding and marketing.
central.eligibility: Individual micro-entrepreneurs, FPOs, SHGs, cooperatives engaged in food processing.

Punjab.name: Punjab Agricultural Mechanization Subsidy
Punjab.description: State subsidy on tractors, power tillers and various farm implements to promote mechanization.
benefits: Subsidy percentage as per implement and category
Punjab.eligibility: Eligible farmers of Punjab; category-wise subsidy norms apply.
Punjab.department: Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare, Punjab

Punjab.name: Custom Hiring Centers (Punjab)
Punjab.description: Support to set up CHCs for shared access to farm machinery, reducing cost of cultivation.
Punjab.eligibility: Farmer groups, FPOs, cooperatives, panchayats as per guidelines.
Punjab.department: Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare, Punjab

Punjab.name: Soil Health Management (Punjab)
Punjab.description: Soil testing services and nutrient management advisories for improved productivity.
Punjab.department: Punjab Soil & Water Conservation / Agri Dept

Punjab.name: Horticulture Development (Punjab)
Punjab.description: Assistance for fruit/vegetable cultivation, nurseries, protected cultivation and post-harvest infrastructure.

Punjab.name: Dairy Development & Allied Sectors (Punjab)
Punjab.description: Support for dairy farming, fodder development, breed improvement, and allied activities.
Punjab.eligibility: Eligible farmers and dairy entrepreneurs in Punjab.
Punjab.department: Department of Animal Husbandry, Dairy Development & Fisheries, Punjab

Punjab.name: Punjab Mandi Board Market Linkage Initiatives
Punjab.description: Market linkage and infrastructure support to improve price realization for farmers.
Punjab.eligibility: Farmers and FPOs operating in Punjab.
